description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $2.7M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Alivaktuk Consulting. The average
  contract duration was 2.26 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.4M. The longest
  contract was 6.29 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.0M.
lookup_name: 'ALIVAKTUK CONSULTING'

s431_number_of_contracts: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '4'

s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '121%'

s424_mean_duration: '2.26'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.4M'
s425_max_duration: '6.29'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.0M'
